name: Fair Frenzy - Your Newest Match Three Addiction
name_original: Fair Frenzy - Your Newest Match Three Addiction
description:
Join in the adventure with our brand new match-3 puzzle extravaganza: Fair Frenzy!!!
Explore the beautiful fairground and see the different rides and candy stands while solving challenging puzzles in our fun and addicting match 3 game. Make combos by popping balloons of the same color to get points and crush the level goals!
Fair Frenzy is FREE to play, and you will even get extra bonuses when you unlock new features! There are also in-app purchases available, but they aren't necessary in order to play!
Connect to Facebook to compete with friends and help each other defeat each challenge by giving free lives.
Features:
•Fun and addicting gameplay
•Brand new game mechanics
•Easy to learn!
•Great for the whole family
•Cute graphics that are adorable to look at
•Frequent updates
•Connect to Facebook to compete with friends
Follow us on Facebook to receive updates and special bonuses
https://www.facebook.com/FairFrenzy
